Added_Other.purpose: Improves navigation and accessibility for players using focused widgets.

Added_Other.name: FFlagCachelessPluginLoading2
Added_Other.mechanism: Loads plugins without using cached data to ensure the latest version is always used.
Added_Other.purpose: Ensures players have access to the most up-to-date features and fixes in plugins.

Added_Other.name: FFlagCapturesAddSavePromptVideoLog

Added_Other.purpose: Helps players understand their game-saving process better and improves support.

Added_Other.name: FFlagChatIntegrationFixShortcut
Added_Other.mechanism: Fixes a shortcut in the chat integration system.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves chat functionality, making it easier for players to communicate.

Added_Other.name: FFlagColorPickerUseGridLayout
Added_Other.mechanism: Changes the layout of the color picker to a grid format.
Added_Other.purpose: Makes it easier for players to select colors quickly and intuitively.

Added_Other.name: FFlagConvertVariantToCorrectType
Added_Other.mechanism: Automatically converts data types for game variants to ensure compatibility.
Added_Other.purpose: Ensures that players experience fewer bugs and issues related to game settings.

Added_Other.name: FFlagCoreComponentManagerEmitAssetDMKeyTelemetry
Added_Other.mechanism: Tracks and sends data about asset management interactions.
Added_Other.purpose: Helps developers understand how players interact with assets, improving future updates.

Added_Other.name: FFlagCustomDspBaseSupportsSidechain
Added_Other.mechanism: Enables sidechain audio processing in custom DSPs.
Added_Other.purpose: Allows for more dynamic and responsive sound effects in games.

Added_Other.name: FFlagDisableEtcFallback
Added_Other.mechanism: Disables a fallback mechanism that allows certain features to work when they normally wouldn't.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves performance by ensuring only the intended features are active.

Added_Other.name: FFlagDisableGalleryStopGap
Added_Other.mechanism: Disables a temporary measure that prevents certain gallery features from loading.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves the experience by allowing smoother access to gallery features without interruptions.

Added_Other.name: FFlagDisableRejoinGroupIdDoubleRead
Added_Other.mechanism: Prevents the system from checking the group ID twice when a player rejoins a game.
Added_Other.purpose: Reduces delays and improves the speed of rejoining games for players.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableAppChatFocusableFixes2
Added_Other.mechanism: Improves focus handling for chat input in the app.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances chat usability, making it easier for players to communicate.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableAudioSpeechToText_PlaceFilter
Added_Other.mechanism: Enables filtering of speech-to-text audio based on the game environment.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves communication by ensuring only relevant audio is transcribed in specific game places.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableConfirmButtonIconOnPlaystation
Added_Other.mechanism: Adds a visual icon for the confirm button specifically for PlayStation controllers.
Added_Other.purpose: Helps PlayStation players easily identify the confirm action, improving gameplay clarity.

Added_Other.name: FFlagExtendedLightRangesFixDirtyCrash
Added_Other.mechanism: Addresses issues with light rendering that could cause crashes in certain scenarios.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances game stability and prevents crashes related to lighting effects.

Added_Other.name: FFlagExtendLightRangeTo120HideRolloutPropertyAndEnable
Added_Other.mechanism: Increases the maximum range of light sources to 120 units and hides the rollout property from users.
Added_Other.purpose: Allows developers to create better-lit environments in games by extending how far lights can reach.

Added_Other.name: FFlagFallbackGenericAbuseReporting
Added_Other.mechanism: Implements a fallback system for reporting abuse when the primary method fails.
Added_Other.purpose: Ensures players can still report issues even if the main reporting system is down.

Added_Other.name: FFlagFFlagFixLayeredSorting
Added_Other.mechanism: Adjusts the rendering order of layered objects to ensure they appear correctly.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves the visual appearance of layered clothing and accessories in the game.

Added_Other.name: FFlagFFlagIconHostSetZIndexToDefault
Added_Other.mechanism: Resets the layering order of icons in the user interface.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves visual organization, making it easier for players to see and interact with icons.

Added_Other.name: FFlagFixBlurryImages
Added_Other.mechanism: Adjusts image rendering settings to enhance clarity.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves the visual quality of images, making them sharper and clearer for players.

Added_Other.name: FFlagFixIsrDeferredPropResize
Added_Other.mechanism: Addresses a resizing issue with deferred properties in the rendering engine.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves visual performance and consistency in games.

Added_Other.name: FFlagFoundationPseudoChildSelectors
Added_Other.mechanism: Enables the use of pseudo-child selectors in UI styling.
Added_Other.purpose: Allows developers to create more flexible and dynamic user interfaces.

Added_Other.name: FFlagIncreaseEffectiveLightGridRadius
Added_Other.mechanism: Increases the radius within which lighting effects are calculated in the game.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances visual quality by allowing more realistic lighting over a larger area.

Added_Other.name: FFlagInitializeAutocompleteOnlyIfEnabledV3
Added_Other.mechanism: Activates autocomplete suggestions only when a specific setting is turned on.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves search efficiency by showing suggestions only when needed.

Added_Other.name: FFlagInternalExportHandleMisnamedR15Bones
Added_Other.mechanism: Fixes issues with incorrectly named bones in R15 character models during export.
Added_Other.purpose: Ensures smoother animations and character functionality for players using R15 models.

Added_Other.name: FFlagISREarlyFilterAnimatedJoints
Added_Other.mechanism: Filters animated joints earlier in the rendering process.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves animation performance and reduces lag during gameplay.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppAddSchemaFieldsToGameClicks
Added_Other.mechanism: Adds additional schema fields to track game clicks in Lua applications.
Added_Other.purpose: Provides developers with better analytics, helping them improve gameplay based on player interactions.
